data.message: I am trying to claim my Church's page (Concord Baptist Church). I am the admin for (Concord Church) - wanting to MERGE the two pages because they are the same. But, we do not know who the admin is for Concord Baptist Church.... Can you help me?!?!

replies.message: Facebook I'd really appreciate your help with a response. Thanks! :)

Hey Caroline. A Page may exist for your business even if you or someone from your business didn’t create it. If the Page is unmanaged, you may be able to claim it: http://bit.ly/2nE9RNy. If the Page is managed, you won't see the option to claim it. Instead, you can report the Page or message the Page in order to request that the current admin grant your personal account admin access: http://bit.ly/2ohJCyX. -Joe

Hi Caroline. If the admin of the Page is featured, you can find them in the "About" section: http://bit.ly/2oGTpLx. If the Page is unmanaged, you may be able to claim it: http://bit.ly/2opstAC. If the Page is managed, you won't see the option to claim it. Instead, you can report the Page or message the Page in order to request that the current admin grant your personal account admin access: http://bit.ly/2mVOIkF. We hope this helps! -Jessica
Facebook I have reported the page twice but nothing has happened...do I just keep reporting the page?!

Hi again - I am hoping you can help me understand how long the process takes for a 'pending Facebook merge' ? Also... we have had ZERO luck claiming the Concord Baptist Church page -- I've reported the page 4 times per Facebook suggestion and I'm not sure if anything has happened. A response is appreciated more than you know.... thx.
